content:
LAND O LAKES Fla PERIOD  A woman suffered serious ankle and arm injuries in an alligator attack Wednesday while swimming in a lake at a nudist resort PERIOD

Dagmar Dow  was airlifted to Tampa General Hospital in serious but stable condition and underwent surgery hospital spokeswoman Ellen Fiss said PERIOD Dow was upgraded to fair condition after the surgery PERIOD

The gator twice attacked Dow a resident of Lake Como nudist resort and both times she was pulled to safety by her husband Ray Pasco County Sheriffs spokesman Jon Powers said PERIOD

The woman was  to  yards offshore in waistdeep water practicing floating for an upcoming scuba diving certification test when the alligator attacked from beneath and pulled her underwater PERIOD

Ray Dow jumped in and pulled his wife free but the gator grabbed her a second time PERIOD  Powers said PERIOD

The injuries were not believed to be life threatening Powers said PERIOD
